title: A clause must be included by the owner/developer in the purchase agreement with the purchaser, owner of the premises/organization or society of the occupiers or the society of purchasers stating that, STPhas been provided in the development and shall have to be maintained in good condition as per the requirement of the Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (MPCB)
clause_text: A clause must be included by the owner/developer in the purchase agreement with the purchaser, owner of the premises/organization or society of the occupiers or the society of purchasers stating that, STPhas been provided in the development and shall have to be maintained in good condition as per the requirement of the Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (MPCB).
